titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duy on Cyprosulfamide: N-( {4-YCyclopropylamino) carbonyl?phenyl}sulfonyl)-2-methoxybenzamide (CAS No. Cyprosulfamide: 221667-31-8).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
12/13/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2011, the duty on Cyprosulfamide: N-({4-[(Cyclopropylamino) carbonyl] phenyl}sulfonyl)-2-methoxybenzamide (CAS No. Cyprosulfamide: 221667-31-8).
